group.name: Brussels Gay and Lesbian Friends Meetup

description:
E.G.G., the English-speaking Gay Group, was started in 1986, as a way to make new acquaintances and to have a drink and pleasant conversation with friends in a relaxed and very casual atmosphere - without having to shout over eardrum-blasting music.
The group has a party each month for gays and lesbians and welcomes men and women of all nationalities and age groups. The parties are held on Sunday afternoons from 3.30 to 7.00. For time, date, location, contact [masked].
name: Our parties are very simple. No program - except meet other GLBT people

group.name: Brussels Gay and Lesbian Friends Meetup

description:
The group has a party each month for gays and lesbians and welcomes men and women of all nationalities and age groups. The parties are held on Sunday afternoons from 3.30 to 7.00. We take over a restaurant or a hotel banquet room for our parties and are thus assured of complete privacy.

Announcements are sent out ten to fourteen days before, giving the date and place. Our parties have been running between 20 and 30 or more people recently.

We ask 3 euros participation - for the cost of mailings and the like - at each party one attends. There is no membership fee. Drinks are on a "cash bar" basis.

If you are not fluent in English, that is not a problem. You are certain to find people who speak your language. Besides, what better way to learn a language than with friends!

If you wish to be on the mailing list after having received this note, please confirm your desire by writing to us at: EGG; chaussée de Waterloo, 189 - Boîte 11; 1060 Bruxelles or by signing up at the next party. You may also e-mail us at: [masked] or call Tom on[masked] 04. If you would rather come to a party first to see what they are like, we will send you the next few announcements so you can attend a party and decide. You can let us know later if you want your name added.

We hope you will join us, and we look forward to welcoming you soon.
name: Have a drink and mingle with the others

group.name: Brussels Gay and Lesbian Friends Meetup

Announcements are sent out ten to fourteen days before, giving the date and place. Our parties have been running between 20 and 30 or more people recently.

We ask 3 euros participation - for the cost of mailings and the like - at each party one attends. There is no membership fee. Drinks are on a "cash bar" basis.

If you are not fluent in English, that is not a problem. You are certain to find people who speak your language. Besides, what better way to learn a language than with friends!
name: Socialize with "old" friends and meet new ones. Very informal.

Brussels Gay and Lesbian Friends Meetup

description:
English-speaking Gay Group

E.G.G., the English-speaking Gay Group, was started in 1986, as a way to make new acquaintances and to have a drink and pleasant conversation with friends in a relaxed and very casual atmosphere - without having to shout over eardrum-blasting music. Not excluded, of course, is the possibility of your finding the man or woman of your life at one of our parties.

The group has a party each month for gays and lesbians and welcomes men and women of all nationalities and age groups. The parties are held on Sunday afternoons from 3.30 to 7.00. We take over a restaurant or a hotel banquet room for our parties and are thus assured of complete privacy.

Announcements are sent out ten to fourteen days before, giving the date and place. Our parties have been running between 20 and 30 or more people recently.

We ask 3 euros participation - for the cost of mailings and the like - at each party one attends. There is no membership fee. Drinks are on a "cash bar" basis.

group.name: Brussels Gay and Lesbian Friends Meetup

description:
English-speaking Gay Group

E.G.G., the English-speaking Gay Group, was started in 1986, as a way to make new acquaintances and to have a drink and pleasant conversation with friends in a relaxed and very casual atmosphere - without having to shout over eardrum-blasting music. Not excluded, of course, is the possibility of your finding the man or woman of your life at one of our parties.

The group has a party each month for gays and lesbians and welcomes men and women of all nationalities and age groups. The parties are held on Sunday afternoons from 3.30 to 7.00. They are followed by an optional dinner for those who are able to stay on and continue the festivities. We take over a restaurant or a hotel banquet room for our parties and are thus assured of complete privacy.

Announcements are sent out ten to fourteen days before, giving the date and place. Our parties have been running between 30 and 40 or more people recently.

We ask 3 euros participation - for the cost of mailings and the like - at each party one attends. There is no membership fee. Drinks are on a "cash bar" basis, and payment for the dinner is made after the meal to the restaurant.

If you are not fluent in English, that is not a problem. You are certain to find people who speak your language. Besides, what better way to learn a language than with friends!
name: English-speaking Gay Group
